themes.description: The 81-84 year war cycle is fully active in 2025. Major wars recur at 81-84 year intervals throughout history. 2025 is 82 years from WWII and 164 years (double cycle) from the American Civil War. We are at the exact intersection of these cycles.

Global pandemics recur at approximately 50-100 year intervals. The 1616-1619 Typhus plague, 1665-1666 Great Plague, 1713-1715 and 1770-1772 Black Pox plagues, 1816-1824 First Cholera, 1918-1919 Spanish Flu, and 2019 COVID all fit this pattern. The impact on markets is significant though hard to predict exact timing.

Fibonacci 61.8 years from JFK assassination (November 1963) points to September 2025. Two presidential assassinations in U.S. history occurred in June/early July at precise cyclical intervals. President Garfield was shot in early July 1881, exactly 144 years ago (another Fibonacci number). June 2025 is a potential flashpoint.

Multiple simultaneous hotspots: Houthis in Yemen absorbing unprecedented U.S. strikes, Iran approaching the negotiating table as predicted, India-Pakistan tensions in April related to 60/90-year cycles, China showing signs of the deep fracture forming. June is the month of peak cyclical convergence.

In 1845 Texas and Florida joined the United States. 180 years later this cycle returns, potentially signaling not just geographic expansion but tendencies toward local sovereignty, fragmentation, and destabilization of core nation-states.

The escalation does not erupt in one day - it drips, accumulates, and then erupts. May 2025 is the time when accumulation can turn into eruption. Recommendations: reduce exposure, tighten stops, consider protective puts, reduce leveraged positions.

risk_rules.detail: Anyone holding profitable stock/index positions, especially after the rally from mid-April, should consider partially reducing positions or at minimum tightening stop losses to below the last weekly low. If the weekly low is too far, use the daily chart.
Everything stated about leveraged ETFs (x2, x3) remains fully in force. At these volatility levels, leverage becomes risk not opportunity.
Emotional leverage is no less important than financial leverage. This is the time to remember: not every rise is a return to normal. Sometimes it is just preparation for further declines.
Anyone in the options space may consider using puts as protection on certain portfolio positions.
For those within swing trading cycles - pay attention to upcoming dates and maintain alertness. Every correction may be an opportunity to enter a new down cycle, and vice versa.
Take profits gradually, tighten stop losses to positions based on daily/weekly chart momentum (not distant weekly support levels tens of percent below).

Our working method is not based on guesswork, gut feeling, or news headlines. It is based on time and deep understanding of what happens beneath the surface. Between panic and control, between dread and mastery.
Note that in swing trading with our cycle turning dates, we are dynamic in our actions and have no reason to act otherwise. The wisdom is not to act out of pressure but out of understanding.

overall_summary: This special June 2025 report from Cycles Trading is a powerful consolidation of their annual forecast (February 2025) and monthly reports for May and June 2025, demonstrating the predictive power of Gann-based cyclical analysis. The report proves that the Israel-Iran attack on the night of June 12-13, 2025 was explicitly predicted months in advance through cyclical analysis. The central thesis is that June 2025 represents a rare convergence of multiple long-term historical cycles (82-year war cycles, 164-year revolution cycles, 50-year Yom Kippur War cycle, Fibonacci-based presidential crisis cycles) that point to continued and potentially escalating volatility in markets and geopolitics. Key actionable dates cluster around June 13-15 (peak convergence) with a potential sharp decline window of June 15-27. The report strongly recommends defensive positioning: reducing long exposure, tightening stops, considering put protection, and avoiding excessive leverage. Looking ahead, June is described as 'just the gate' - war cycles of 82-84 years do not open in one day but awaken in stages, with July already defined in the annual report as the heir to this wave.
